forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High near 16C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 kph.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 61F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low near 10C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 kph.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 49F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Wind increasing. A few clouds from time to time. High 15C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 kph.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High near 60F. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Gusty winds diminishing after midnight. Low 9C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 kph.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 47F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies with gusty winds developing later in the day. High 17C. Winds NNW at 25 to 40 kph.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 63F. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 9C. N winds at 15 to 30 kph, decreasing to less than 10 kph.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 47F. NNE winds at 10 to 20 mph, decreasing to less than 5 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 19C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 kph.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 67F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 9C. Winds W at 10 to 15 kph.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 49F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 18C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 kph.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High around 65F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early, then becoming foggy and damp later at night. Low around 10C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 kph.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to considerable cloudiness and fog after midnight. Low around 50F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two around the area in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 kph. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two around the area in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 63F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally fair. Low near 10C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 kph.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear skies. Low 49F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 17C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 kph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies early will give way to low clouds and fog after midnight. Low near 10C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 kph.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies early, then becoming foggy and damp later at night. Low near 50F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 18C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 kph.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 66F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Low 11C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 kph.
